K01vinv16_u:577: yo 'navavādas tad adhikaraṇaṃ yad vā adhikaraṇaṃ so 'navavādaḥ?
K01vinv16_u:585: trīṇy adhikaraṇāni vivādādhikaraṇam āpattyadhikaraṇaṃ kṛtyādhikaraṇaṃ ca; 3)
K01vinv16_u:587: yaḥ saṃghasyānavavādaḥ anavavādaṃ anavavādaprasthāpanaṃ tad upādāya yaḥ kalaho bhaṇḍanaṃ vigraho vivādaḥ; 4)
K01vinv16_u:590: yā āpattis tad adhikaraṇaṃ yad vā adhikaraṇaṃ sā āpattiḥ?
K01vinv16_u:595: āpattis tāvan nādhikaraṇaṃ pañcāpattijātayaḥ āpattinikāyā āpattiskandha ity ucyate pārājikāḥ saṃghāvaśeṣāḥ pāyattikā pratideśanikā duṣkṛtāś ca; 2)
K01vinv16_u:597: trīṇy adhikarāṇāni vivādādhikaraṇam anavavādādhikaraṇaṃ kṛtyādhikaraṇaṃ ca; 3)
K01vinv16_u:600: pārājikā saṃghāvaśeṣā pāyattikā pratideśanikā duṣkṛtāś ca;
K01vinv16_u:605: yat kṛtyaṃ tad adhikaraṇaṃ yad vā adhikaraṇaṃ tat kṛtyam?
K01vinv16_u:611: yaḥ saṃghasya jñaptir jñaptidvitīyaṃ jñapticaturthaṃ karma; 2)
K01vinv16_u:613: trīṇy adhikaraṇāni vivādādhikaraṇaṃ anavavādādhikaraṇam āpattyadhikaraṇaṃ ca; 3)
K01vinv16_u:615: yā saṃghasya kriyājñaptir jñaptidvitīyaṃ jñapticaturthaṃ karma tad upādāya yaḥ kalaho bhaṇḍanaṃ vigraho ḥvivādaḥḥ; 4)
K01vinv16_u:619: Śāriputra and Maudgalyāyana settle a dispute
K01vinv16_u:620: vivādādhikaraṇaṃ bhikṣavaḥ katibhir adhikaraṇaśamathair dharmair damayitavyaṃ śamayitavyaṃ vyupaśamayitavyam?
K01vinv16_u:623: kathaṃ saṃmukhavinaya adhikaraṇaśamatho bhavati kathaṃ caiṣām adhikaraṇānām damaś ca bhavati śamaś ca vyupaśamaś ca,
K01vinv16_u:625: buddho bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ varśā upagato jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme;
K01vinv16_u:626: tena khalu samayena saṃbahulā bhikṣavo janapade varśā upagatāḥ;
K01vinv16_u:627: teśām antarvarṣo utpannaḥ kalaho bhaṇḍanaṃ vigraho vivādaḥ;
K01vinv16_u:628: tais tad adhikaraṇam āyuṣmantayoḥ śāriputramaudgalyāyanayor upanikṣiptam;
K01vinv16_u:629: tābhyaṃ tad adhikaraṇam vyupaśamitaṃ dharmeṇa vinayena śāstuḥ śāsanena;
K01vinv16_u:630: atha sambahulā bhikṣavo janapade varṣoṣitās trayāṇāṃ māsānām atyayāt kṛtacīvarā niṣṭhitacīvarā samādāya pātracīvaraṃ yena śrāvastīṃ tena cārikāṃ
K01vinv16_u:632: atha saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratiśamayya pādau prakṣālya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ;
K01vinv16_u:633: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇāḥ;
K01vinv16_u:635: buddhā bhagavantaḥ āgantukān bhikṣūn anayā pratisaṃmodanayā pratisaṃmodate,
K01vinv16_u:636: kuto yūyaṃ bhikṣava etarhy āgacchata kutra vā varṣoṣitāḥ;
K01vinv16_u:641: janapadād vayaṃ bhadanta etarhy āgacchāmo janapade ca smo varṣā uṣitāḥ;
K01vinv16_u:642: kaccid yūyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ sukhasparśaṃ janapade varṣā uṣitā na cāstha klāntā piṇḍakena?
K01vinv16_u:643: na hi vayam bhadanta janapade sukhasparśaṃ varṣā uṣitā na ca sma klāntā piṇḍakena,
K01vinv16_u:644: api tv asmākam antarvarṣeṇa utpannaḥ kalaho bhaṇḍanaṃ vigraho vivādaḥ;
K01vinv16_u:645: tair asmābhis tad adhikaraṇam āyuṣmadbhyāṃ śāriputramaudgalyāyanābhyām (Adhik-v 80)
K01vinv16_u:647: tābhyaṃ tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśamitaṃ dharmeṇa vinayena śāstuḥ śāsanena ca
K01vinv16_u:650: śakṣyanti bata me sthalasthāḥ śrāvakāḥ utpannotpannāny adhikaraṇāni vyupaśamayituṃ dharmeṇa vinayena śāstuḥ śāsanena;
K01vinv16_u:651: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ sthalasthair bhikṣubhir utpannotpannāny adhikaraṇāni vyupaśamayitavyāni dharmeṇa vinayena śāstuḥ śāsanena iti;
K01vinv16_u:652: bhikṣavo na jānate ke sthalasthāḥ kati vā iti;
K01vinv16_u:654: ye śaknuvanti saṃgham antareṇa utpannotpannāny adhikaraṇāni vyupaśamayitum;
K01vinv16_u:656: asti sthalastho na kāyena saṃvṛto na vācā;
K01vinv16_u:659: katamo na kāyena saṃvṛto na vācā?
K01vinv16_u:660: yathāpitat sthalastho bhikṣūṇāṃ kalahajātānām bhaṇḍanajātānāṃ vigṛhītānāṃ vivādam āpannānāṃ pakṣāparapakṣavyavasthitānām ātmanā upasaṃkramyaivam
K01vinv16_u:661: sādhv āyuṣmantaḥ idam adhikaraṇam sūdgṛhītaṃ na durgṛhītam;
K01vinv16_u:662: susaṃprayuktaṃ na duṣprayuktaṃ suparāmṛṣṭaṃ na duṣparāmṛṣṭam idaṃ ca idam ca vadata idaṃ ca idam ca mā vakṣyatha;
K01vinv16_u:665: vayam āyuṣmatām pakṣo balam sahāyakā iti dvitīyam api pakṣam ātmanaivopasaṃkramyaivam (A 339a)
K01vinv16_u:666: āha: sādhv āyuṣmanta idam adhikaraṇam sūdgṛhītaṃ na durgṛhītaṃ susaṃprayuktam na duṣprayuktam suparāmṛṣṭaṃ na duṣparāmṛṭam idaṃ ca idaṃ ca vadata idaṃ ca idaṃ ca mā vakṣyatha;
K01vinv16_u:669: vayam āyuṣmatām pakṣo balaṃ sahāyakā iti;
K01vinv16_u:670: ayaṃ sthalasthaḥ na kāyena saṃvṛto na vācā;
K01vinv16_u:671: katamaḥ sthalasthaḥ kāyena saṃvṛto na vācā?
K01vinv16_u:673: vigṛhītānāṃ vivādam āpannānāṃ pakṣāparapakṣavyavasthitānām ekasmin pakṣe nātmanā upasaṃkrāmati api tu dūtam anupreṣayati:
K01vinv16_u:674: sādhv āyuṣmanta etad adhikaraṇaṃ sūdgṛhītaṃ na durgṛhītaṃ susaṃprayuktaṃ na duṣprayuktaṃ suparāmṛṣṭaṃ na duṣparāmṛṣṭam;
K01vinv16_u:675: idaṃ cedaṃ ca vadata idaṃ cedaṃ ca mā vakṣayatha,
K01vinv16_u:678: vayam āyuṣmatāṃ pakṣo bala sahāyakā iti;
K01vinv16_u:680: api tu dūtam anupreṣayati sādhv āyuṣmantaḥ etad adhikaraṇaṃ sūdgṛhītaṃ na durgṛhītaṃ susaṃprayuktaṃ na duṣprayuktaṃ suparāmṛṣṭaṃ na duṣparāmṛṣṭam;
K01vinv16_u:681: idaṃ cedaṃ ca vadata idaṃ cedaṃ ca mā vakṣyatha,
K01vinv16_u:684: vayam āyuṣmatām pakṣo balaṃ sahāyakā iti;
K01vinv16_u:685: ḥ ayaṃ sthalasthaḥ kāyena saṃvṛto na vācā;
K01vinv16_u:686: katamaḥ sthalasthaḥ kāyena saṃvṛto vācā ca;
K01vinv16_u:687: yathāpitat sthalastho bhikṣūṇāṃ kalahajātānāṃ bhaṇḍanajātānāṃ vigṛhītānāṃ vivādam
K01vinv16_u:688: āpannānāṃ pakṣāparapakṣavyavasthitānām ekasmin pakṣe nātmanā upasaṃkrāmati nāpi dūtam anupreṣayati,
K01vinv16_u:689: dvitīyam api nātmanopasaṃkrāmati nāpi dūtam anupreṣayati
K01vinv16_u:690: tatra yo 'yaṃ sthalastho na kāyena saṃvṛto na vācā ca evaṃrūpaḥ sthalasthaḥ asaṃmato na saṃmantavyaḥ saṃmataś cāvakāśayitavyaḥ; (A 339b)
K01vinv16_u:692: evaṃrūpaṃ hi sthalastham āgamya saṃghe 'nutpannāni cādhikaraṇāny utpadyante utpannāni ca na kṣipraṃ vyupaśamaṃ gacchanti dharmeṇa vinayena śāstuḥ
K01vinv16_u:693: tatra yo 'yaṃ sthalasthaḥ kāyena saṃvṛto na vācā ca evaṃrūpaḥ sthalasthaḥ asaṃmato na saṃmantavyaḥ saṃmataś cāvakāśāyitavyah;
K01vinv16_u:695: evaṃrūpam api sthalastham āgamya saṃghe 'nutpannāny adhikaraṇāny utpadyante utpannāni ca kṣipraṃ ḥnaḥ vyupaśamaṃ gacchanti dharmeṇa vinayena śāstuḥ śāsanena;
K01vinv16_u:696: tatra yo 'yaṃ sthalasthaḥ kāyena saṃvṛto vācā ca evaṃrūpaḥ sthalasthaḥ asaṃmataḥ saṃmantavyaḥ saṃmataś nāvakāśayitavyaḥ;
K01vinv16_u:698: evaṃrūpaṃ sthalastham āgamya saṃghe 'nutpannāny adhikaraṇāni notpadyante utpannāni ca kṣipram (Adhik-v 82)
K01vinv16_u:699: eva upaśamaṃ gacchanti dharmeṇa vinyena śāstuḥ śāsanena;
K01vinv16_u:711: yathā ca tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśāmyati sarve te samavahitā bhavanti saṃmukhībhūtāḥ,
K01vinv16_u:714: yena dharmeṇa yena vinayena ḥyenaḥ śāstuḥ śāsanena tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśāmyati tena dharmeṇa tena vinayena tena śāstuḥ śāsanena tad adhikaraṇaṃ
K01vinv16_u:716: sacet sthalasthā bhikṣavaḥ tad adhikaraṇaṃ na śaknuvanti vyupaśamayituṃ tais tad adhikaraṇaṃ saṃghe upanikṣeptavyam,
K01vinv16_u:717: saṃghena tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśamayitavyaṃ dharmeṇa vinayena śāstuḥ śāsanena;
K01vinv16_u:718: saṃghena tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśāntaṃ dharmeṇa vinayena śāstuḥ śāsanena suvyupaśāntam
K01vinv16_u:728: yāvanto bhikṣavaḥ sīmāprāptāḥ kriyāprāptās te sarve samavahitāḥ saṃmukhībhūtāḥ;
K01vinv16_u:730: samavahitāś ca bhikṣavaḥ saṃukhībhūtā na prativahanti na pratikrośanti;
K01vinv16_u:731: yeṣāṃ prativahatāṃ pratikrośatāṃ pratikrośo ārohati ḥkarmāṇi ca kurvantiḥ idam ucyate saṃghasaṃmukham; (Adhik-v 83)
K01vinv16_u:733: ye tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśamayanti yeṣāṃ ca tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśāmyati te sarve samavahitā bhavanti saṃmukhībhūtā;
K01vinv16_u:736: yena dharmeṇa yena vinayena ḥyenaḥ śāstuḥ śāsanena tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśāmyati tena dharmeṇa tena vinayena ḥtenaḥ śāstuḥ śāsanena tad adhikaraṇaṃ
K01vinv16_u:738: sacet saṃghaḥ na śaknoti tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśamayituṃ tataḥ ḥpaścātḥ saṃghena vyūḍhakā bhikṣavaḥ saṃmantavyāḥ daśa vā pañca vā;
K01vinv16_u:740: śayanāsanaprajñaptiṃ kṛtvā gaṇḍīm ākoṭya pṛṣṭhavācikayā bhikṣūn samanuyujya sarvasaṃghe saṃniṣaṇṇe saṃnipatite pūrvaṃ tāvad utsāhayitavyāḥ:
K01vinv16_u:741: utsahadhve yūyaṃ buddharakṣitadharmadattasaṃghasenā vyūḍhakāḥ santo bahiḥ sīmāṃ gatvā saṃghasyādhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśamayitum iti;
K01vinv16_u:742: saced utsahante tair vaktavyam utsahayāma iti;
K01vinv16_u:743: tataḥ paścād ekena bhikṣuṇā jñaptiṃ kṛtvā karma kartavyaṃ:
K01vinv16_u:744: śṛṇotu bhadantāḥ saṃgha ime buddharakṣitadharmaḥdattaḥsaṃghasenā vyūḍhakāḥ utsahante bahiḥ sīmāṃ gatvā saṃghasyādhikaraṇāni vyupaśamayitum;
K01vinv16_u:745: sacet saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ kṣameta anujānīyāt saṃgho yat saṅgho buddharakṣitadharmadattasaṃghasenān vyūḍhakān saṃmanyeta;
K01vinv16_u:746: buddharakṣitadharmadattasaṃghasasenā vyūḍhakā utsahante saṃghasya bahiḥ sīmāṃ gatvā adhikaraṇāni vyupaśamayitum;
K01vinv16_u:749: śṛṇotu bhadantāḥ saṃgha ime buddharakṣitadharmadattasaṃghasenā vyūḍhakā utsahante bahiḥ sīkmāṃ gatvā saṃghasyādhikaraṇāni vyupaśamayitum;
K01vinv16_u:751: buddharakṣitadharmadattasaṃghasenāḥ vyūḍhakā bahiḥ sīmāṃ gatvā saṃghasyādhikaraṇāni vyupaśamayiṣyanti;
K01vinv16_u:752: yeṣām āyuṣmatāṃ kṣamate buddharakṣitadharmadattasaṃghasenān vyūḍhakān saṃmantum:
K01vinv16_u:753: buddharakṣitadharmadattasaṃghasenā vyūḍhakāḥ bahiḥ simāṃ gatvā saṃghasyādikaraṇāni
K01vinv16_u:757: (Adhik-v 84 te ca bahiḥ sīmāṃ gatvā saṃghasyādhikaraṇāni vyupaśamayiṣyanti;
K01vinv16_u:759: evam etad dhārayāmi vyūḍhakais tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśamayitavam dharmeṇa vinayena śāstuḥ śāsanena;
K01vinv16_u:760: vyūḍhakais tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśāntaṃ ḥsuḥvyupaśamitaṃ vaktavyaṃ dharmeṇa śāstuḥ śāsanena
K01vinv16_u:768: ye tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśamayanti yeṣāṃ ca tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśāmyati te save samavahitā bhavanti saṃmukhībhūtāḥ;
K01vinv16_u:771: yena dharmeṇa yena vinayena ḥyenaḥ śāstuḥ śāsanena tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśāmyati tena dharmeṇa tena vinayena ḥtenaḥ śāstuḥ śāsanena tad (A 340b)
K01vinv16_u:774: saced vyūḍhakā bhikṣavaḥ na śaknuvanti tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśamayitum,
K01vinv16_u:775: tair vyūḍhakavyūḍhakā bhikṣavaḥ saṃmantavyā aṣṭau vā nava vā;
K01vinv16_u:776: vyūḍhavyūḍhakais tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśamayitavyaṃ dharmeṇa vinayena śāstuḥ śāsanena;
K01vinv16_u:777: vyūḍhakavyūḍhakais tad adhikaraṇam vyupaśamitaṃ suvyupaśamitaṃ vaktavyam;
K01vinv16_u:778: saced vyūḍhakavyūdhakā bhikṣavaḥ tad adhikaraṇaṃ na śaknuvanti vyupaśamayituṃ tais tad adhikaraṇaṃ saṃghe upanikṣeptavyam;
K01vinv16_u:779: tataḥ saṃghenādhikaraṇasaṃcārako bhikṣuḥ saṃmantavyaḥ pañcabhir dharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ;
K01vinv16_u:780: adhikaraṇasaṃcārako bhikṣur asaṃmato na saṃmantavyaḥ saṃmataś cāvakāśayitavyaḥ;
K01vinv16_u:782: chandād gacchati dveṣān mohād bhayād gacchati saṃcāritāsaṃcāritaṃ cādhikaraṇaṃ na jānāti;
K01vinv16_u:783: ebhiḥ pañcabhir dharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ adhikaraṇasaṃcārako bhikṣur asaṃmato na saṃmantavyaḥ saṃmataś cāvakāśayitavyaḥ;
K01vinv16_u:784: pañcabhis tu dharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ adhikaraṇasaṃcārako bhikṣur asaṃmataś ca saṃmantavyaḥ saṃmataś ca nāvakāśayitavyaḥ;
K01vinv16_u:786: na chandād gacchati na dveṣān na mohān na bhayād gacchati; (Adhik-v 85)
K01vinv16_u:788: ebhiḥ pañcabhir dharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ adhikaraṇasaṃcārako bhikṣur asaṃmataś ca saṃmantavyaḥ saṃmataś ca nāvakāśayitavyaḥ;
K01vinv16_u:790: śayanāsanaprajñaptiṃ kṛtvā gaṇḍīm ākoṭya pṛṣṭhavācikayā bhikṣūn smanuyujya sarvasaṃghe saṃniṣaṇṇe saṃnipatite ḥpūrvaṃ tāvad utsāhayitavyāḥ:
K01vinv16_u:792: saced utsahante tair vaktavyam utsahayāma iti;
K01vinv16_u:793: tataḥ paścādḥ ekena bhikṣuṇā jñaptiṃ kṛtvā karma kartavyam:
K01vinv16_u:794: śrṇotu bhadantāḥ saṃgha ayam evaṃnāmā adhikaraṇasaṃcārako bhikṣur utsahate saṃghasyādhikaraṇaṃ saṃcārayitum;
K01vinv16_u:795: sacet saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ kṣameta anujānīyāt saṃgho yat saṃgha evaṃnāmānam adhikaraṇasaṃcārakaṃ bhikṣuṃ saṃmanyeta,
K01vinv16_u:800: ayam evaṃnāmā adhikaraṇasaṃcārako bhikṣur utsahate saṃghasyādhikaraṇaṃ saṃcārayitum;
K01vinv16_u:801: tat saṃgha evaṃnāmānam adhikaraṇasaṃcārakaṃ bhikṣuṃ saṃmanyeta evaṃnāmā adhikaraṇasaṃcārako bhikṣuḥ saṃghasyādhikaraṇaṃ saṃcārayiṣyati;
K01vinv16_u:802: yeṣām āyuṣmatāṃ kṣamate evaṃnāmānam adhikaraṇasaṃcārakaṃ bhikṣum saṃmantum,
K01vinv16_u:805: bhāṣantām; saṃmataḥ saṃghena evaṃnāmā adhikaraṇasaṃcārako bhikṣuḥ; so 'yaṃ (A 341a)
K01vinv16_u:808: etad dhārayāmi adhikaraṇasaṃcārakasyāhaṃ bhikṣor āsamudācarikān dharmān prajñāpayāmi;
K01vinv16_u:809: adhikaraṇasaṃcārakeṇa bhikṣuṇā idam adhikaraṇam sasthavire saprātimokṣe saṃghe upanikṣeptavyaṃ yathāvṛttaṃ cārocayitavyam;
K01vinv16_u:811: idam adhikaraṇam amuṣminn āvāse iyaccirakālasamutpannam asmin vastuni;
